that Eric Schmidt could become the Chief Executive of Apple Inc., whose CEO Steve Jobs has gone on an indefinite medical leave and Chief Operating Officer Tim Cook has been taking care of day to day operations,'' Raman reports. At first thought, Eric Schmidt moving to Apple would rather seem unlikely, but not impossible either.` While not necessarily likely, we think this scenario is at least a possibility,' Jefferies analyst Peter Misek wrote in his note to clients... If successful, Katie Price would join Louis Walsh , Dannii Minogue and Cheryl Cole on the show and Simon Cowell 's ex-girlfriend and show mentor Sinitta thinks she will be a great choice. Comment on this Article She said: Having Katie Price on the panel would make interesting viewing, so I can definitely see it working. She can do anything she puts her mind to. She's got the personality that would fit the role perfectly. Simon Cowell really likes her as well. There's no denying they get along. However, Katie Price - who recently split from second husband Alex Reid- faces competition from Robbie Williams as the Take That star is also being lined up to replace Simon Cowell .
